description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Tikka Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Tikka Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pastes, oil, garam masala and coriander in a bowl. Halve 1 lime and squeeze juice into spice mix. Season with salt. Cut remaining lime into wedges.
Split prawns lengthways along the back and devein. Lay prawns into a shallow tray. Spread spice paste all over prawns. Set aside for 10 minutes to marinate. Preheat a barbecue on medium-high heat.
Lay prawns, cut-side-down onto barbecue and cook for 2 minutes, then turn and cook for a further 1-2 minutes or until charred.
Transfer to a platter, garnish with parsley and serve with lime wedges.
